participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: cheerful and creative, enjoys connecting with others and sharing experiences.
participant_1.background: i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. i am a blonde girl with really short hair. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games. my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves.

participant_2.personality: frustrated and cynical, but looking for a way to improve his situation.
participant_2.background: i am planning on getting a divorce. my wife spends all my money. i work as a car salesman. i'm 40 years old. i hate my job.
